name: Kid Khaos
description:
In Kid Chaos you play as the only responsible adult at a Kids birthday party! Try to manage the chaos before too many kids are naughty, go home and tell their parents!

This game was made in the spare time of two people with full time jobs within a week for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game jam. The theme was "Let there be Chaos".

Credits

Code , Music - Joe Mills aka "Plucky"
Artwork - Freddie Jones

SFX

- Children playing sfx: Playground noises in Luxembourg Gardens, Mxsmanic
- Cake eating sfx: Chewing, Carrot, A.wav, InspectorJ
- Ballpit sfx: Getting out of a ball pit, pfranzen
- Foam dart gun sfx: Nerf Gun/Catapult Being Loaded and then Shot, Alex-Fullam
- Present Unwrapping sfx: Paper Ripping, EminYILDIRIM
